title: Squids Will be Squids: Fresh Morals, Beastly Fables
description: A collection of new and wacky fables with fresh morals, which are about all kinds of bossy, sneaky, funny and annoying people. A general moral offered by the book is, "If you are planning to write fables, don't forget to change people's names and avoid places with high cliffs".
author: Jon Scieszka
